1.「待たせたな。来たぜ～ ガウラド。: Sorry to keep you waiting. Here I am~ Gaurad.

2.「<cs_pchero>殿も 来たのですか。| いいでしょう。歓迎いたしますよ。: <cs_pchero> is here too? That's fine. You|are welcome.

3.「で なんの用なんだ？| お小言なら もう聞きたくないぜ。| マジメに やってる: So what do you want? I don't want to hear any|more of your complaints. I'm trying to be|serious.

5.「は？ 何を言ってるんだ ガウラド。: Huh? What are you talking about, Gaurad.

6.「超天道士の名を持つ者と| やっと 闘える日が来ました。: The day has finally come when I can fight|someone who goes by the name of "Ch[...]

8.「おいおい。お前の じょうだんは| 相変わらず つまんねえなあ。| もっと 笑え: Hey, hey, hey. Your jokes are as boring as|ever. Make it more funny.

9.「超天道士を名乗る者を殺し| その名に宿りし チカラを得る……。| それが この: My mission is to kill those who claim to be|supernatural beings and to gain the power that|resides in their names.

11.<pipipi_mid>「超天道士を倒すため 魔界より訪れた使者。| 武闘魔ガウ: <pipipi_mid>The messenger who came from Demon|World to defeat Chotendoji. Warrior Demon|Gaurad...that is my true form.

12.「だが なんということか……。| 私が目的を果たさんとしたとき 超天道士は| 病: But lo and behold... just as I was about to|fulfill my goal, the Supernaturalist became|ill and was about to die.

13.「そんな おとろえた超天道士を倒しても| チカラを得ることなど できぬ！| 私が: I cannot gain power by defeating such a|moribund supernatural being! I will only|defeat the perfect Chosen One!

14.「だから 待ったのだ。| 超天道士の名を継ぐ者が現れる その日を！| 貴様を倒せ: That's why I waited. The day when Heir to a|Name will appear! If I defeat you, my mission|will be fulfilled!

15.「くだらねえ……。| そんなことのために お前は これまで| オレの世話をしてき: You've been taking care of me all this time|for this crap?

16.「ヤーン！ 超天道士の名を継ぐ者よ！| さあ 私と闘え！| そして そのチカラを: Yarn! Heir to a Name! Come, fight me! And give|me your power!

17.「イヤだね。オレは お前の相手なんか| これっぽっちも する気ね～よ。: I don't like it. I don't want to deal with you|in the slightest.

18.「超天道士の名を継ぐ者が 逃げるのか！？: Heir to a Name, the Chotenkyoji, is running|away!

19.「ちげ～っつーの。お前なんかじゃ| オレの相手にならね～って 言ってるんだよ。: That's not true. I'm saying you're no match|for me.

20.「……そうだな。コイツに勝てたら| お前の相手をしてやっても いいぜ。: Well...yeah. If you can beat him, I'll be|happy to play with you.

21.「<cs_pchero> 悪いが頼むぜ。| アンタの闘いを 見せてやってくれよ。: <cs_pchero> I'm sorry, but please. Show them|what you're fighting for.

22.「ガウラド。お前じゃ <cs_pchero>を| 倒すなんて できね～と思うぜ。: Gaurad. I don't think you can defeat|<cs_pchero>.

23.「<cs_pchero>を倒せば 貴様が| この私と闘うと いうのだな……。|: If I defeat <cs_pchero>, you will fight|me... Is there any doubt in your mind?

24.「<cs_pchero>よ。まずは貴様からだ。| さあ 私の使命のため 消えるが: <cs_pchero>. You first. Now, vanish for the|sake of my mission!

25.「まさか……。超天道士の名を持たぬ者に| この私が 敗れる……だと！？: No way... that I would be defeated by someone|who does not have the name of Chotenkyoji?

26.「名前に チカラが宿るわけじゃない。| お前がしてることには なんの意味もね～よ: Names don't have power. What you're doing|means nothing.

27.「超天道士の名なんか 継いでなくても| <cs_pchero>は こんだけ 強い: Even if he didn't inherit the name of a|supernatural being, <cs_pchero> is still as|strong as ever.

28.「だが 私は 超天道士を倒さねば……。| 使命を果たさねば 魔界へ帰ることはでき: But I must defeat the Chosen One... and|complete my mission or I will never return to|Demon World!

30.「わかった。オレが相手をしてやる。: I'll take care of it. I'll deal with him.

31.「フフ……。なんという強さ……。| さすが 超天……道士……の……。: Fufu... what strength... as expected of a|super heavenly... wayward...

32.「なあ ガウラド……。オレと お前はさ。| ずいぶん長く 一緒に暮らしてたよな。: You know, Gaurad... you and I... You and I|have been living together for a long time.|I've said many selfish things...

33.「じ～さんが死んだ後も お前がオレの世話を| 焼いてくれたのは そんな くだらな: You took care of me even after your|grandfather died, and it wasn't just for that|stupid mission, was it?

34.「なのに なぜ いつまでも| そんな使命に こだわってさ……。| こんなことをし: So why did you persist in this mission... and|do this...

35.「貴様には わかるまい……。| 魔界に生きる者に 課せられた使命の重さを。: You have no idea the weight of the mission|that is placed on those who live in Demon|World.

36.「だが……。だが なぜ私は| その使命を果たさねば ならなかったのか……。| 今: But... but why I had to fulfill that mission I|don't remember now.

37.「いつからか 私は 理由もなく| ただ 与えられた使命を果たすためだけに| 生き: Somewhere along the way, I seem to have lived|my life without reason, just to fulfill the|mission I was given...

38.「……使命のことは もう忘れちまえ。| そして ゆっくり眠れば いいさ。: Forget about the mission. And get a good|night's sleep.

39.「せめて 最期は……。あなたの知る姿で……。: At least... in your last moments... as you|know them...

40.「私は 使命を果たすことに囚われ……。| 安息の日など 一日たりとも| 訪れるこ: I was so caught up in fulfilling my mission|that not a single day of rest ever came...

41.「ただ……なぜか……| あなたと共に暮らした日々は……。: It's just... somehow... the days I spent with|you...

42.「とても 楽しかっ……た……。: It was a lot of fun...

45.「中に コレが入ってたよ。| 武闘家の証……って 言われてるヤツだ。: I found this inside. It's called the Proof of|MRT.

46.「超天道士が死ぬ間際に オレに渡せと言って| ガウラドのヤツに あずけたらしいぜ: The supernaturalist gave it to Gaurad to give|to me when he was dying. That's what it says|in this letter...

47.「大事に 持ってやがったんだなあ。| アイツの使命とは 関係ないモノだろうに。: He must have taken good care of it. It has|nothing to do with his mission.

48.「……なあ <cs_pchero>。| 突然だけどさ。オレと勝負してくれよ。|: ...Hey <cs_pchero>. Hey <cs_pchero>, I|know it's sudden, but... I'd like you to play|with me. I want to make sure of something.

49.「アンタと拳を交えれば きっと| その答えが わかるはずなんだよ。: I'm sure I'll know the answer to that question|when I get into a fist fight with you.

50.「本格的に コロシアムで やろうぜ。| そこの関係者の グララってオーガの女に|: Let's do it in earnest at the Coliseum. I've|already talked to an ogre woman named Grala|who works there.

51.「オレは ジュレットの町に ヤボ用がある。| アンタは 先に ラッカラン島の|: I have some business in Julet Town. I want you|to go to the Coliseum on Luckland Island|first.

52.「<cs_pchero> 今度は イケるよな。| これまでの修行を 思いだせばい: <cs_pchero> You'll be good this time. Just|remember what you've been through. I know you|can do it.

53.「ヤーン。まだ貴様は 闘おうとしないのか？| 私の使命は 超天道士の名を持つ貴様: Yarn. Still you will not fight? My mission|will not be fulfilled until I defeat you, who|bear the name of the Chosen One!

54.「<cs_pchero>は まだ 負けてね～よ。| お前の前で 倒れてるか？|: <cs_pchero> hasn't lost yet~. Is he down in|front of you? Is he getting up and trying to|fight?

55.「……相変わらず クチの減らない男だ。| よかろう。ならば 今度は完全に| たた: ...as usual, a man who never loses his mouth.|Very well. Then this time I'll beat you to a|pulp!

56.「よく来てくれた～ <cs_pchero>。| ここなら ジャマも入らないだろ？: Thanks for coming~ <cs_pchero>. No jammers|in here, right?

57.「アンタと 拳を交えれば| オレが確かめたいことの 答えが出るんだ。| だから: If I get into a fist fight with you, I'll get|the answer to what I want to find out. So|please don't go easy on me.

58.「……もう 言葉は いらないよな。| あとは 拳で語り合おうぜ。: We don't need any more words, do we? Let's|talk about the rest with our fists.

60.「<cs_pchero>……。アンタなら| また来てくれると 思ってたぜ～。: <cs_pchero>... I knew you'd come back for|more!

61.「勝負は まだ ついてないよな？| <pc>の本気を オレは| まだ 見せてもら: You haven't won yet, have you? I haven't had a|chance to see what <pc> is really|made of yet!

62.「今度は 見せてくれよ～。| <cs_pchero>の 本気の拳をな！！: Let's see it this time~! Let's see the real|fist of <cs_pchero>!

63.「ははっ 強いなあ～ <cs_pchero>。| 超天道士の名を継いだオレが 負: You are so strong~ <cs_pchero>. I, who|inherited the name of Chotendo-sensei, lost.

64.「だが ずっと 確かめたかったことが| アンタと闘って やっと わかった。| そ: But I finally figured out what I've been|wanting to be sure of since I've been fighting|you. Will you ask me what it is?

65.「……オレが じ～さんに弟子入りしたのは| 超天道士って名が 欲しかったからじゃ: I didn't become your apprentice because I|wanted the name "Chotendoji. It was because I|admired his strength.

66.「その名を継がなくても 超天道士を超える強さを| 身につけられると オレは信じて: I believed that even if I didn't inherit the|name, I could acquire strength beyond that of|a supernatural being.

67.「だから ずっと 名を継ぐことを避けてたのさ。| 本気のじ～さんと闘って 勝つ日: That's why I've been avoiding taking over the|name. Until the day came when I could really|fight and win against the old man...

69.「……本当はさ。超天道士の名を継いだ| アンタと闘って 勝つつもりだったんだ。|: The truth is. I was going to fight you, the|heir to the Chotentoshi name, and win. But it|turned out the other way around.

70.「だが 超天道士の名を継いだ このオレを| アンタが 超えてみせてくれた。: But you have surpassed me, the heir to the|name of Chotenkyoji.

71.「名前が強さを もたらすわけじゃない。| 強さってのは 人に宿るってことが| や: A name does not bring strength. I can finally|confirm that strength resides in people...

72.「よし……っと。| <cs_pchero>のおかげで| いろいろと ふっきれたぜ: Well...here we go. Thanks to <cs_pchero>,|I'm all set.

73.「超天道士の名は 今やオレの身体の一部だ。| この名と共に オレは生きていくよ。: The name "Chotentoshi" is now a part of me. I|will live with this name.

75.「アンタは いい武闘家になるよ。| 超天道士のように 伝説に名を残す| そんな: You'll be a good martial artist. You'll be a|great martial artist, like the legendary|Choten Doshi.

76.「このオレが 言うんだ。| 絶対に まちがいね～って！: I'm the one who's going to tell you. I'm|telling you, we're not fuckin' wrong!

77.「オレに勝ったんだからな。| コレは アンタに受け取ってほしい。| ガウラドの置: You beat me. I want you to take this. It's the|Proof of MRT that Gaurad left behind.

78.「その武闘家の証は いつか オレが| 証に ふさわしい男になる日まで| アンタに: I'll leave that Proof of MRT to you until the|day I become a man worthy of it.

79.「勝者への ごほうびだ。| コレを アンタに贈らせてもらおう。: A reward for the winner. This is for you.

80.「オレも 超天道士の名に恥じない| 武闘家にならなきゃ いけね～からな。| もっ: I must become a martial artist who lives up to|the name of Chotendo-sensei. I'll work even|harder on my training.

81.「今度 闘うことがあったら 絶対に負けないぜ。| 超天道士の名に かけてな！: If we ever fight again, I'll never lose. In|the name of Chotendo-sensei!
